text_block_list.text:
The summer training camp has begun once again! 
Win Variation was going above and beyond, more so than usual.
I want to help out that hardworking girl! That thought made me more passionate in guiding her. I'd do anything to help her if I could, but…

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Phew, that felt great. 
Gonna rest for a bit now.
choice_data_list: Great work today, make sure to rest up.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Gotcha! Great work today too, Trainer. 
But man it's hot… this year is really hot ain't it…

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: So hot…

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Um… so how do I beat this heat?
choice_data_list: Getting heatstroke is scary, but if you sweat…

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
No, that's not what I was asking! 
Um, so do you have a… favorite season!?

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Ah, wait no! Um, well… 
I'm sorry, it's nothing important!

It looked like she wanted to say something, right? 
Lately, she's been acting pretty awkwardly.
choice_data_list: (Could it be just like that time…)

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Haaaah～, this is tough. This so-called "small talk"…

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: (How on Earth was I able to talk normally back then? What did I do to stop myself from holding back…)

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
It has to be the topic, right? 
When there's nothing important to talk about I just start peppering them with questions without realizing…

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Topics not relating to training… hm…

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text:
Hey, girls! Tonight, there's this 
festival going on nearby! I wanna go～!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: A festival… that's it!
—That night, while doing some administrative work…

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Ah! E-evening! 
Still working, I see. Pardon me then!

Then, a few minutes later. 
After finishing my work and stretching, what I saw in the corner of my eye was…

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Ah!
I knew it, she had something she wanted to talk about. Something might be bothering her again, if that was the case…

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Ah, Trainer…

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Um… so… uh!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
S-so… the thing is, do you want to go to the festival? 
It looks like… it's being held nearby!

I was both surprised, but not surprised at the same time… 
I wonder if the reason she was holding back was because it wasn't related to training…

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: —Whoa～, it's so lively here～!
choice_data_list: I bought us some candied apples!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Wah! So suddenly!? 
My heart isn't ready!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Ah, wait no, it's alright! I'm really happy about it! 
But… before I eat, please let me steel my resolve!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
—Alright. I shall now… dig in. 
Oh shining and adorable candied deity…

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Mmmmm～ It's so crisp! Hehe… Ah, that's right, speaking of candied apples… eating this reminded me of something.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: When I was a child, I didn't know what a "princess apple" was… Pft… hehe.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Well, I thought that apples were the same even if they were harvested early. I thought that apples were red from the very beginning.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: That's why… when I was walking and saw an unripe green apple for the first time, I pointed at it and went "It's a green apple!"…

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Then my parents said "You still don't know～?". 
I could feel all the question marks over my head when I replied "Know what? That it's green?"

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Just like that, the conversation kept going in circles… hehe. 
That was… just some random memory I recalled.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: …Ehehe… hahaha!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Aight! 
Trainer, is there something you'd like?
choice_data_list: Hmm… Ah, that's nostalgic right there～

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
That plushie right there? 
That character certainly was popular back then.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: So you like those types of things?

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: When you were a kid!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Um, if you're fine with it, I want to hear stories of when you were a child! Like which race was your favorite or any sports that you did.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
I want to hear anything and everything. 
Oh yeah, how about while we're doing the katanuki game—
Just like that we toured the various stalls, indulging in silly little conversations throughout. Soon enough, after tiring ourselves out we ended up at the quiet beachside…

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Phew～ Katanuki sure got me fired up～

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Your theory? Even though we followed your theory… we both ended up breaking the cookie! Fufufu!
choice_data_list: Well, it was just something I read online…

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Fufu… well, this is fine too. 
…I thought it was a good idea.
choice_data_list: I know right, this was fun.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
Really!? 
I also had… hehe, so much fun!

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text:
I… wanted to do this "small talk". 
Just like before.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: So I thought that I could talk to you when you weren't busy. So in those small breaks I ended up asking you some weird and random questions… Ehehe.

In short, even "good friends respect each other"… 
Although, since she was serious, she way overthought it.
While there were times I was busy, yes, I also had times where I was free. I felt the same feeling as her of wanting to communicate and chit-chat with each other.
choice_data_list: Then let's talk more, a lot more.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Okay…
choice_data_list: I'll make sure to start the conversation more.
I'll make sure to start the conversation more.

text_block_list.name: Win Variation
text_block_list.text: Okay! I'll do the same too!
Her happy smile was dazzling. Once again, it made me think that I'd want to become a trainer with whom she won't feel the need to hold back.
